snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron faces a political division in his own country over the European Union’s budget.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron faces political division over his country's role in the European Union's pending 1 trillion euro, or $1.3 trillion, budget; despite intense lobbying by Cameron, large faction of Conservative rebels join forces with Labour Party members to defeat his proposal, which supported allowing EU spending to increase at rate of inflation over the seven-year life of budget.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron faces a political division in his own country over the European Union’s budget.

headline.seo: British Leader Faces Fight Over Europe Budget
headline.main: New Battle in Britain Over Budget for Europe
headline.print_headline: New Battle In Britain Over Budget For Europe
